word:
Chap. 101 - Diary Entries 

                                                     MS - 54 - 1890 

                       In Battle Creek Again 
                   Diary, December 30 to 31, 1890 


                  Battle Creek, December 30, 1890 


     We reached Battle Creek about three p.m. Our family were glad to see us and it seemed good to get home.
